description: Plays a sound with the ability to control volume and looping

play.description: Play this sound from the start

sound.description: The sound this actor should play

loops.description: How many times this sound should loop

volume.description: The volume of this sound, where 0 is silent and 1 is maximum volume

preload.description: Decode the entire sound before playing it. This should be set to false for music or other long sounds.

category.description: This determines what volume slider this sound respects

positional.description: Whether or not the sound should play as if it is in 3D space
